list_ex_of_english: Tombet combines layers of sliced potatoes, aubergines and red bell peppers previously fried in olive oil.
The category fruit refers also to products such as aubergine, sweet pepper and tomato.
The "saag" can be steamed or cooked in oil with other vegetables such as "begun" (aubergine).
Tomato, cucumber and aubergine are the most important crops.
Zucchini, aubergine, tomato and pepper are commonly used as fillings.
To her horror, she found the tasty morsel on the end of her fork was mouse, not aubergine.
For some reason she always seems to need a small aubergine to be able to do so.
Some, like aubergine, are put directly over the flames.
